name: Root Pursuit
description:
Created in 2 days for the 2023 Global Game Jam by me and my gf, the theme being Roots!

Controls with the arrow keys - press Up to jump and Down to crawl.

You play as a headlouse escaping from a comb - avoiding debris that's piled up on the scalp and collecting eggs for points to secure the future of all dirty little nits.

We'd love to hear your highscores, so please leave them in the comments!
